name: FRONTiERS (itch) (jenofonte.games)
description:
Somewhere near a city, on the border that divides two worlds, a boy must find his sister so that his world can be perfect. To cross the energy barrier and reach the city, you must find and activate the four beacons spreaded around the limits of the border.

Be brave.

twitter: @JenofonteSAS
